title: Could 750d wheels replace 700c? Moots and WTB share the details about their custom gravel bike
content:
WTB is testing a new wheel size called 750d. Do you need to get rid of your 700c gravel bike for this? Not so fast.

Read the full article at Could 750d wheels replace 700c? Moots and WTB share the details about their custom gravel bike on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
